Class TSPState

  • java.lang.Object
    • TSPState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<TSPState>

    public class TSPState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<TSPState>
    Internal representation of our A* search state. Note that comparison and hashing of this class ignores some of its fields. See notes on its methods for details.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CompletedJobSet completedSet
      Set of completed jobs; used in differentiating between states.
      private int distance
      Distance traveled to get to this node.
      private Point point
      Current location of the courier; used in differentiating between states.
      private Job prevJob
      Last job completed to get to this state, or null.
      private TSPState prevState
      Last state that led to exploring this state, or null.
      private int priority
      Priority of this state, calculated from the traveled distance and a heuristic estimate.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TSPState(Point point, int distance, int estimate, CompletedJobSet completedSet, java.util.List<Job> jobs, Job prevJob, TSPState prevState)
      Creates a new state with the given parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(TSPState other)
      Compares two states by their priority in the A* search.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      Compares this state against another, based on their locations and completed sets.
      CompletedJobSet getCompletedSet() 
      int getDistance() 
      Point getPoint() 
      Job getPrevJob()

    • Constructor Detail

      • TSPState

        public TSPState(Point point,
        int distance,
        int estimate,
        CompletedJobSet completedSet,
        java.util.List<Job> jobs,
        Job prevJob,
        TSPState prevState)
        Creates a new state with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        point - Current location of the courier.
        distance - Distance traveled so far by the courier.
        estimate - An admissible estimate from some heuristic.
        completedSet - Set of completed jobs.
        jobs - List of all jobs.
        prevJob - The last job completed before getting into this state, or null.
        prevState - Previous state that lead to exploring this state, or null.

    • Method Detail

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(TSPState other)
        Compares two states by their priority in the A* search. This enables ordering states according to A* order by standard Java containers.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<TSPState>

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares this state against another, based on their locations and completed sets. See Solver comments.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object

      • getCompletedSet

        public CompletedJobSet getCompletedSet()
        Returns:
        Set of completed jobs.

      • getDistance

        public int getDistance()
        Returns:
        Distance traveled so far.

      • getPoint

        public Point getPoint()
        Returns:
        Current position.

      • getPrevJob

        public Job getPrevJob()
        Returns:
        Last completed job, or null.

      • getPrevState

        public TSPState getPrevState()
        Returns:
        Previous state that lead to exploring this state.

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Hashes this state using its point and completed set. Note that we want to consider two states to be equal if and only if they describe the same node in our graph. See Solver comments.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
